channel.title: Post your code snippets here!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt]Introduction[/size][/b][/center]
This topic is only for posting snippets of code that don't qualify for a full tutorial. According to Taharok, posting any code snippets elsewhere will result in punishments by the staff members, not me.
To post a snippet of code, copy the code into the [size=12pt][b][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com]MoparScape pastebin[/url][/b][/size] and upload that paste. Then, in a reply to this topic, paste the link of the uploaded snippet. I will be going through each and every snippet posted here to be featured on this post. Do not try to hide any server's address or malicious code inside the snippets or you will receive a harsh punishment.
There is now no need to worry of this thread not being updated regularly, because I will do my best.
[hr]
[center][b][size=15pt]Important notices[/size][/b][/center]
This is a good example you should follow when you want to post a snippet as a reply to this topic: [quote="Good Example"]Revision (317, 508 etc): 317 - DeltaScape Description: Changing your welcome message Link to pastebin: http://mscp.pastebin.com/SfaQE5Qn[/quote] This other example is not preferred: [quote="Bad Example"]Revision (317, 508 etc): badscape Description: welcome Link to pastebin: http://mscp.pastebin.com/duqVDHQq[/quote]
Good examples of code snippets uploaded on the pastebin have instructions commented out. That's the point of a pastebin - you only upload code into it. Write out specific instructions as comments and not onto the actual code itself!
Most importantly, set your post expiration to "Never" and the post exposure to "Public". This will save the hassle of unknown pastes which none of us can fix.
[hr]
[center][b][size=15pt]List of snippets[/size][/b][/center]
[b]Snippets for the 317 revision[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f7b3dfec1][Czar] x pk3r xx: Eating without weapon fix[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/HkkfqEWs][DeltaScape] Aeolian: Better potion-mixing[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/XzSruZwM][DeltaScape] deathschaos9: Zombie head emote[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f3a1b7fed][DeltaScape] Goth Wolf: Druidic rituals[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f29efd2d][DeltaScape] Goth Wolf: Yell command[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/W5KpBWps][DeltaScape] I Vain I: Bone-on-altar prayer[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/Gt6y9QGv][DeltaScape] I Vain I: Eating food[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/xYxZ7NkW][DeltaScape] I Vain I: Farming[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f5bccd6ff][DeltaScape] faded vision: Working multi-combat signs[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f68f0c395][DeltaScape] Mr Mopar: Tokkul-gold converter commands[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/iDst8GwL][DeltaScape] runefreak10: Modifying energy[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/zX6JYbhp][DeltaScape] staypuff: Receive PK points only in an area[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/Zax9hGFP][DeltaScape] ytuio9: Custom spell[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f34664e5e][Devolution] a net: Banning hosts[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f58f4e360][Devolution] fatwallet: Stock Market[/url][/li] [li][url=http://java.pastebin.com/D3C8M3Yq][Devolution] Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS: Secure jailing system[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f34149bf3][Devolution] johnw1: Camelot Party Room[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/d3vG506U][General] zyle1992: Region system[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/AGjZNgbs][Project Insanity] Pouch: Roll-backs fix[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/QHs6aLWs][winterLove] 1pure1337: Player count[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/CRmjCSgH][winterLove] Chosen Pkz: Max range hit formula[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/f21ac2837][winterLove] cows1471: Skillcape emotes[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f2d928d3][winterLove] I Samn I: Stone-style menus[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f5a011ee2][winterLove] jGod: Item-on-NPC packet fix[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f69daccae][winterLove] John459: Working ring of health[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f23680a4a][winterLove] M A R T Y: Increased Verac's effectiveness against Protect from Melee[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/bHqTSCg5][winterLove] RuneSpace: Drop party commands[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f2fef156f][winterLove] Teh Moose: Degrading Barrows armour[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/fELtuJig][winterLove] VbCoder: Controlling where you teleport[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/GuMx8KgE][winterLove] xweetok599: Using item on item[/url][/li][/ul]
[b]Snippets for the 508 revision:[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/ffc188b7][Bulby] Gods army: Crafting godswords[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/NA9rPmfx][Bulby] n10si t: Spawning pets[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f3ad7ea23][Unspecified] glabay: Teleports[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/XesZMexb][Palidino76] Canownueazy: Full emote system with walking delays[/url][/li][/ul]

item.title: Post your code snippets here!
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Introduction[/size][/center]

This topic is only for posting snippets of code that don’t qualify for a full tutorial. According to Taharok, posting any code snippets elsewhere will result in punishments by the staff members, not me.

To post a snippet of code, copy the code into the [size=12pt]MoparScape pastebin[/size] and upload that paste. Then, in a reply to this topic, paste the link of the uploaded snippet. I will be going through each and every snippet posted here to be featured on this post. Do not try to hide any server’s address or malicious code inside the snippets or you will receive a harsh punishment.

There is now no need to worry of this thread not being updated regularly, because I will do my best.

[hr]

[center][size=15pt]Important notices[/size][/center]

This is a good example you should follow when you want to post a snippet as a reply to this topic:

[quote=“Good Example”]Revision (317, 508 etc): 317 - DeltaScape

Good examples of code snippets uploaded on the pastebin have instructions commented out. That’s the point of a pastebin - you only upload code into it. Write out specific instructions as comments and not onto the actual code itself!

Most importantly, set your post expiration to “Never” and the post exposure to “Public”. This will save the hassle of unknown pastes which none of us can fix.
